ModMetaData.name: Save Our Ship 2 - Star Wars Ships
ModMetaData.author: FantasyFan
ModMetaData.description: Adds ten new spaceship parts that you can add to your spaceships: -Consular-class cruiser -Charger c70 retrofit -CR90 corvette -Sphyrna-class corvette -Republic gozanti-class cruiser -Imperial gozanti-class cruiser (standard + surveillance) -DP20 frigate -CR20 troop carrier -CSS1 star shuttle -IPV2C stealth shuttle
